about_econ_technology: ECON Technology stands for our core competencies: Energy (renewable energy, photovoltaics), Electrical (building technology, electrical engineering), and Engineering (tailor-made industrial solutions).
econ_technology_description: The name ECON Technology stands for Energy, Electrical, and Engineering. "CON" embodies Concept, Connection, and Control. ECON combines these elements into sustainable, efficient, and innovative solutions.
advisor_desc: We accompany you from the initial consultation to the completed project.
discover_solutions: Discover our solutions for a sustainable future.
elektroinstallation_desc: Comprehensive electrical installation services for your building needs.
erweiterbarkeit_desc: Flexible solutions that can be expanded and adapted to your future needs.

ghassen_description: Experienced electrical engineer with extensive expertise in electromechanics.

faq_question_1: How does the free consultation work?
faq_answer_1: Simply contact us via the form or phone. We'll schedule a session tailored to your needs.
faq_question_2: What regions do you operate in?
faq_answer_2: We operate across Germany and can support projects across Europe upon request.
faq_answer_3: Yes, we offer turnkey installations through our certified partner network.
